net.sf.JRecord.utilityClasses

Class SchemaLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.utilityClasses.SchemaLoader

  • public class SchemaLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used by some of the utilities. Most users will be better off using JRecordInterface1.COBOL to create IIOBuilder classes
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

      • loadSchema

        public static ExternalRecord loadSchema(java.lang.String schemaFileName,
                        int split,
                        java.lang.String fontname,
                        int binformat)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used by several utilities. Most users will be better off using JRecordInterface1.COBOL to create IIOBuilder classes
        Parameters:
        schemaFileName - name of the schema/Cobol file
        split - Cobol split option
        fontname - character-set
        binformat - Cobol Dialect.
        Returns:
        External Record
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
